metadata.title: CVE-2024-40724 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in Assimp versions prior to 5.4.2allows a local attacker to execute arbitrary code by inputting a speciallycrafted file into the product.

criterions.comment: assimp package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
